options: Develop a real-time dashboard to track monthly sales trends by region and product category
Implement a machine learning model that predicts customer churn based on historical purchasing behavior and engagement metrics.
Design a strategy to allocate warehouse space to optimize inventory turnover while minimizing operational costs.
Create a supply chain simulation model to recommend the most efficient delivery routes under varying traffic and weather conditions.
Develop a workforce scheduling system to recommend optimal staffing levels for each shift, minimizing labor costs while maintaining service quality.
